mapper.sql: id AS "id", audit_user AS "auditUser", audit_time AS "auditTime", audit_status AS "auditStatus", manuscript_type AS "manuscriptType", type_id AS "typeId", question_difficulty AS "questionDifficulty", question_type AS "questionType", answer_choice_number AS "answerChoiceNumber", answer_id AS "answerId", special_knowledge_id AS "specialKnowledgeId", police_classification AS "policeClassification", legal_basis AS "legalBasis", answer_describle AS "answerDescrible", stu_code AS "stuCode", stu_title AS "stuTitle", com_content AS "comContent"
